members.name: Alex Johnson
members.bio: Alex brings powerful vocals and dynamic guitar work to the band. With over 10 years of performing experience, they're the heart of our sound.

members.name: Sam Martinez
members.bio: Sam's groovy bass lines provide the foundation for our music. Their stage presence and musicality keep the energy flowing throughout every performance.

members.name: Jordan Taylor
members.bio: Jordan's powerful and precise drumming drives our rhythm section. They bring intensity and creativity to every song, making each performance unforgettable.

members.name: Casey Williams
members.bio: Casey's electrifying guitar solos and melodic riffs add depth and excitement to our sound. Their technical skill and passion shine through in every performance.
